title: # of reports does not matter
body:
in the card, " you've been reported 13 times across 20 games "  Across 5 years i never got even one chat restrict. Soon as clans became a thing. I have to watch everything i say. # matters stfu and stop lying to ure players. Ffs you even state it in the fucking summary. Also. Just to vent at you weak pathetic kids, the fcking client is auto censored. If you dont like bad words. Dont turn it off. REALLLYYY high level IQ required there. 

The biggest issues in the game are afk's feeders and inters but fuck it, punish people trying to win and typing stuff to help the team win the games. I actually laughed at a rioters explanation of " you were negative toward a teammate who messed up" Im like yea. No fucking shit. He fcked up, now lets rally, focus and not do it again.  If riots willing to pay me sure ill spend 5 minutes explaining to people but if not get over yourself and maybe make a meaninful fucking guide yourselves. 

Long story short. YES # of reports matters you lying fucks you literally say it yourselves.  Clans skew the fuck out of this because being held hostage in league is one of the main things killing the desire to play or people. You have the balls to ban players like your games fcking immortal. Stop lying blantly. It fucking pathetic. 

Also. more lux skins. $$$$$$ p.s u are the worse players ive ever seen. Shield doesnt do damage. Stop throwing it at the enemy. 

( side note ive never used or  think racism hate speech or the such is ok under any circumstance )

replies.body: I really don't know why I was expecting a PSA instead of an (incorrect) rant.

There is a difference between saying something  constructive and flaming. Apparently you do not get that at all. Also no number of reports in one game does not matter.  It Only takes one for the system to look at it.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosLordMadis,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=2A3YuA02,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-07-01T00:05:37.121+0000)
>
> There is a difference between saying something  constructive and flaming. Apparently you do not get that at all. Also no number of reports in one game does not matter.  It Only takes one for the system to look at it.

Also no number of reports in one game does not matter. You okay?

> [{quoted}](name=RelaxIdoThis,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=2A3YuA02,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-07-01T00:22:46.196+0000)
>
> Also no number of reports in one game does not matter. You okay?

That  no was not suppose to be there >.<  It was suppose to  say: Also Number  of reports in one game does not matter

Profanity is notagainst the rules, so idk what your point is with the censor. Thats just a personal preference thing maybe for parents who lettheir kids play, or just people who dont like profanity. You will never get banned for a swear word alone. If you spam it, youll get punished for spam. If you call someone a fucking ass, you'll get punished for insulting people. Its not about the profanity. 

Now, the crucial thing you seem to have missed, is that its "number of reports in a single game" dont matter. So if 9 people report you in a game, it has the same effect as 1. Its about mass reporting or gang reporting. Hope that clears that up for you.

Report numbers infact DO matter, I remember Riot Tantram and others specifically manually banning someone for heavy report numbers, so yeah contradicitng themselves and on the perm ban "reform card" it says you were in fact "HEAVILY" reported. In my opinion with reasonably facts at hand I can safely say that Riot themselves are doing this to confuse the community on the shady workings of this failure of a system made by RIOT LYTE. Who had such a holier then thou atitud and guess what. He was toxic POS irl. GF sued cause he was into 19 yr olds. Lmao. The system was made by the people it oppresses. Interesting...

Eh it is just in the wording and how people choose to read it. Number makes more sense when it comes to griefing manual reviews but not when it comes to actually flagging a game. It is possible for it to simultaneously matter and not. Even the 13 times over 20 games can just be read as evidence that it wasn't "one bad game".

Not really, contradicting the actual statements, saying 1 review flags said game, but acts more harshly on the amount of reports, like skipping a 25 game cr from a previous 10 straight to a 2 week because of X>1 reports.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Apathy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=2A3YuA02,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-07-01T00:23:18.339+0000)

In my opinion with reasonably facts at hand I can safely say that Riot themselves are doing this to confuse the community on the shady workings of this failure of a system made by RIOT LYTE. Who had such a holier then thou atitud and guess what. He was toxic POS irl. GF sued cause he was into 19 yr olds. Lmao. The system was made by the people it oppresses. Interesting...

I remember that too. Never forgot it since I saw it and was going to bring that up also.

Compaies gone downhill bad, try playing as if you were a new player, so much toxic sludge and bots. It`s actually unplayable. Luckily level 30 accs are pretty cheap and for me anyway have had 100% success rate. DONT ENDORSE ACC BUYING PLS NO BAN ME MODS

> [{quoted}](name=Pandemic Punch,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=2A3YuA02,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-07-01T00:24:59.684+0000)

^^^ lol riot lyte ftw
report numbers only matter for manual reviews. It indicates how many people dislike those plays.

Who had such a holier then thou atitud and guess what. He was toxic POS irl. GF sued cause he was into 19 yr olds. Lmao. The system was made by the people it oppresses. Interesting...

GF sounds like a bit of a %%%% then eh? Sued him for being into 19 year olds? What kinda man wouldnt like a girl because shes 19? Do you even porn? Are you some kinda AGEIST??? lol talk about holier than thou, jesus man... you shame him for being sued for that? Lol.

Was he convicted for anything? What became of the lawsuit? Do you even know any details about it? Or you just judging him based on the fact he was sued by a girl in this litigious society where people sue eachother all the time?
